content:
### **AI Influencers & Thought Leaders - Table Review**

#### **📌 Table Summary**
This table tracks influential individuals whose insights, research, or frameworks contribute to AI-driven decision-making. It connects thought leaders to Knowledge Vault entries, AI-driven workflows, and personal knowledge structures to ensure AI is informed by credible, high-impact sources. Influence scope can be adjusted to limit or expand the impact of a given influencer’s insights on decision-making.

---

### **🔍 Property Definitions & Requirements**
| **Property**               | **Type**        | **Required?**  | **Description** | **Comments/Questions** |
|----------------------------|----------------|---------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------|
| **Name**                   | Text           | 🟦 Required  | The full name of the influencer or thought leader. | If anonymous, system should mark as such. |
| **Tags**                   | Multi-select   | ❌ Not Required | Categorization for filtering and retrieval. | Should these mirror PKD/Knowledge Vault tags? |
| **AI-Driven Decision Impact** | Text (Long)   | ❌ Not Required | Description of how their insights influence AI-driven workflows. | Optional but useful for auditing AI thought processes. |
| **Date Added**             | Date           | 🟦 Required  | The date this influencer was added to the database. | Auto-generated. |
| **Social Media Handles**   | URL/Text       | ❌ Not Required | Handles for X, LinkedIn, Facebook, TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube. | Should we auto-pull content? Future consideration. |
| **Contributed Insights**   | Relation (PKD) | ❌ Not Required | Links this influencer to PKD insights they contributed to. | - |
| **Influences**             | Relation (Knowledge Vault) | ❌ Not Required | Connects the influencer to Knowledge Vault content. | - |
| **Life Area Influence**    | Relation (Life Optimization) | ❌ Not Required | Links the influencer to specific life areas they impact. | - |
| **Deep Research Available** | Checkbox      | ❌ Not Required | Marks if deep research has been conducted on this influencer. | Should this be required if Influence Scope is marked? |
| **Influence Scope**        | Select         | 🟦 Required  | Determines whether their influence is **active** (broad) or **limited** (only applies to specific Knowledge Vault entries). | If Limited, AI should restrict influence. |
| **Knowledge Vault**        | Relation (Knowledge Vault) | ❌ Not Required | Links to specific books, articles, or research by the influencer. | - |

---

### **📌 Final Adjustments & Next Steps**
✅ Confirm whether **Influence Scope** should trigger required Deep Research.  
✅ Ensure **Tags** logic aligns with Knowledge Vault & PKD for cross-referencing.  
✅ Lock definitions & document in **Notion DB Canvas.**  
✅ Move to **Sample Data Generation.**

---

Let me know if you want to tweak anything before locking this in! 🚀
